A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is so depressing to watch Disney take my favorite franchise and turn it into this. This movie doesn't even have a plot that makes sense. 5 story lines go no where and have no impact on the movie. They destroy Luke Skywalk and are so desperate to make Rey a good character they destroy Kilo Ren in the process. At this point\, I don't have any interest in watching another Star Wars movie. If the studio doesn't care enough to tell a story that makes sense\, then why should I care?
